pugg
a c++ framework for plug-in management
Features

    * Header only library, no installation
    * Auto loading of plug-ins from files
    * Version control for plug-ins
    * Object oriented design
    * Unicode file name support.

Requirements

Since Pugg uses LoadLibrary function from windows.h, windows Environment is necessary.
Installation

Pugg is header only. You can extract the header files in .\include directory
puggKernel.h
puggServer.h
puggPlugin.h
puggDriver.h
to any location that your compiler can see, or just add the files to your project.

http://pugg.sourceforge.net/
